page.title: 06THINGS to do in RHAYADER
page.content: Angling Association:Association Foot- ball:Athletics:Badminton:Bowling: British Legion:Cancer Relief:Cancer Research:Chamber of Trade:Computer Club:Cricket:Darby and Joan:Diabetic Association:Horticultural Society: Karate:Luncheon Club for Over Sixties: Mothers'Union:Mother and Toddler Group:Motor Club:Pre-School Playgroup: Political Associations:Rhayader Players Drama Group:Rugby Football: Scouting and Guiding Associations: Tennis:Women's Institute:Y.M.C.A.Youth Club:Young Farmers. Auction Sales:Carnival:Choirs(men's, women's,Mixed Festival):Dance classes: Darts,Dominoes and Pool in local pubs: Disco Dances:Evening Classes:Fishing: Pony Trekking:Sales of Work:Schoolboy Scramble:Snooker and Billiards(Men's Club):Swimming in river and school pool.
